title: Mastery of Biology Foundational Concepts: Online Formative Assessment-Based PBL Program

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level foundational knowledge in life sciences
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized PBL learning design for aspiring life sciences professionals. Provides customized content to preempt conceptual misunderstandings through formative assessment feedback

learning_goals: They can explain the five core concepts related to cell structure and metabolism with over 80% accuracy.
They can identify and correct biological error cases presented in online formative assessments with 90% accuracy.
They can write problem-solving reports applying biological concepts in PBL team projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
